skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Ritualistic Fury
skillTree.description: Although lacking the finesse of Elven magics, the sorceries of the north are no less potent, for they channel furious, Daemonic power.

skillTree.name: Might of the Swamp
skillTree.description: The swamp will rise again, its inhabitants enjoying the blessings of the Dark Gods once more.

skillTree.name: Miasma of Despair
skillTree.description: The same enchanted mist that obscures Fimir Balefiend dwellings can also be conjured to confound and horrify would-be attackers on the battlefield.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Hatred
skillTree.description: Before they were abandoned and forgotten by the Dark Gods, fimirs had fought bloody wars in their name against all races created by the Old Ones

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for all Fimir units (including heroes)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +5% for Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for all Fimir units (including heroes)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Fimir units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Demonic Sigils
skillTree.description: Fimirs were once the favoured servants of the Chaos Gods and still retain fragments of the great magics they wielded millennia ago

effects.description:
"Physical Resistance: +10% for Trolls, Manticores, Giants, Wyrms and Mammoths"
	(Lord's army)

"Armour: +10 for Troll, Manticore, Giant, Wyrm and Mammoth units"
	(Lord's army)

"Physical Resistance: +20% for Trolls, Manticores, Giants, Wyrms and Mammoths"
	(Lord's army)

"Armour: +20 for Troll, Manticore, Giant, Wyrm and Mammoth units"
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Drinker of Blood
skillTree.description: Dining upon the blood of slaughtered enemies may attract the notice, and maybe the favour, of the Hound.

skillTree.name: Chron's Wrath
skillTree.description: The Great Hound of War thirsts eternally for blood and slaughter, its rage manifesting itself in the unstoppable martial spirit of its warriors.

skillTree.name: Fury of the Hound
skillTree.description: The Hound's unearthly fury is personified by its Champions' thirst for war and hunger for unending blood and violence.

skillTree.name: Noxious Vessel
skillTree.description: Thusly, the virulent maladies of the Crow are borne forth to repulse and infect its mortal foes; there lieth victory eternal.

skillTree.name: Putrefying Ooze
skillTree.description: This fetid, disgusting pus is so repulsive to the untainted that it mimics traditional armour of far greater substance.

skillTree.name: Plague of the Crow
skillTree.description: Unstable and miscreated, the Crow's strength spreads and grows like the most successful of diseases, consuming all before consuming itself and beginning again.

skillTree.name: Indulger in the Exotic
skillTree.description: The Serpent's temptations come in many forms, all of them designed to appeal to the twisted desires buried deep within us all.

skillTree.name: Intoxicating Visions
skillTree.description: Seductive images of sensual luxuries may tempt the enemy from their chosen paths onto roads much, much less travelled and from which there can be no return.

skillTree.name: Seduction of the Serpent
skillTree.description: Although the youngest of the Dark Gods, the Serpent is no less potent and can bind mortals to eternal service with alluring visions or tantalising temptations.

skillTree.name: Spirit Wanderer
skillTree.description: More fool they who go to war and quest with minds unfocused, for they risk the Eagle's desolate, underhand deceptions.

skillTree.name: Dark Deceiver
skillTree.description: The Eagle weaves a complex web of duplicity around its servants, further bracing their combat abilities in subtle, unexpected ways.

skillTree.name: Sorcery of the Eagle
skillTree.description: As the undisputed master of magic, the Eagle uses complex sorcery to influence its followers and draw opponents into his multifarious, interwoven schemes.

skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Shrouded by the Fogs
skillTree.description: Nobody knows whether the mist follows fimirs wherever they go or if they exude it, but it´s a very useful tool in battle nonetheless

skillTree.name: United by the Will of the True Gods
skillTree.description: Though all fimirs consider humans as usurpers, they will join forces with the followers of the Dark Gods when they march to slaughter and plunder the weaker southerners with the objective of attract their gaze once more

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +3 for Marauder, Berserker and Champion units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +3 for Marauder, Berserker and Champion units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for Marauder, Berserker and Champion units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Marauder, Berserker and Champion units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +10 for Marauder, Berserker and Champion units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Marauder, Berserker and Champion units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hunters of Men
skillTree.description: Fimirs dont really care about getting trophies of great beasts as they consider that the Dark Gods will surely value the skulls and souls of the unbelievers much more highly

effects.description:
Ammunition: +7% for Hunters and Horsemen units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +3% for Hunters and Horsemen units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +14% for Hunters and Horsemen units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +6% for Hunters and Horsemen units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Hunters and Horsemen units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +10% for Hunters and Horsemen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unnatural Selection
skillTree.description: Only the fiercest creatures can survive the frozen north; the strongest are rounded up for war and starved into viciousness, ready for the next battle.

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Inhuman Fury
skillTree.description: Reviled and despised even for most Norscans, these beings are united in their fanatic faith and their hatred for everyone who does not worship the Dark Gods

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 for Fimirs and Skinwolves
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for Fimir and Skinwolves units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Fimirs and Skinwolves
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +7% for Fimir and Skinwolves units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for Fimirs and Skinwolves
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Fimir and Skinwolves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Feast of Fresh Flesh
skillTree.description: Offering them the chance to devour the corpses of the fallen is the easiest way to get these most stupid of Norscan denizens to follow you to battle

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +4% for Troll and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +3 for Trolls and Giants
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +7% for Troll and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Trolls and Giants
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Troll and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +10 for Trolls and Giants
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Enthralled Horrors
skillTree.description: Fimirs use ancient knowledge obtained from demons to capture and force these creatures to follow their orders

effects.description:
"Charge Bonus: +5 for Manticores, Wyrms and Mammoths"
	(Lord's army)

"Melee defence: +3 for Manticores, Wyrms and Mammoths"
	(Lord's army)

"Charge Bonus: +10 for Manticores, Wyrms and Mammoths"
	(Lord's army)

"Melee defence: +6 for Manticores, Wyrms and Mammoths"
	(Lord's army)

"Charge Bonus: +15 for Manticores, Wyrms and Mammoths"
	(Lord's army)

"Melee defence: +10 for Manticores, Wyrms and Mammoths"
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Champions of the North
skillTree.description: In spite of their savage nature, they are possessed of a savage code of conduct and form a loose brotherhood of those considered worthy.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 15% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hardened Hunters
skillTree.description: No beast too large, no adversary too great; no quarry - mortal or otherwise - can evade them.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Icy Wrath
skillTree.description: The intense cold and near-constant darkness of the far north make for a certain kind of killer.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hulks of Death
skillTree.description: The freezing darkness and stunning violence of the far north bring no small solace to those who have lost everything and wish to forget.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Stand or Die!
skillTree.description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

skillTree.name: Fight or Die!
skillTree.description: There is no other choice. There never was.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Takers of All
skillTree.description: That which is not offered up to the Dark Gods of the North in tribute is harvested by their servants for their own petty gain.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Norse Resilience
skillTree.description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

skillTree.name: Swelling of Doom
skillTree.description: Maybe it is the influence of the Dark Gods that has caused the populace to burgeon and proliferate beyond their natural bounds?

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Savage Skills
skillTree.description: There's something about the harsh, unforgiving nature of northern life that makes its occupants fight harder and longer than many of their soft, southern equivalents.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +4%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +8%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +12%

skillTree.name: Unnatural Healing
skillTree.description: Something strange - something no scholar really wishes to discover - governs who dies and who lives in the warlike northern wastes.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fuelled by War
skillTree.description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

skillTree.name: Spawn of Chaos
skillTree.description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Blind
backgroundSkills.description: Although the eyes do not see, the other senses remain open.

backgroundSkills.name: Boring
backgroundSkills.description: "Another speech? Very well… does it have to be so… lengthy?"

backgroundSkills.name: Choleric
backgroundSkills.description: Does a rage as hot as Khorne's burn within?

backgroundSkills.name: Clumsy
backgroundSkills.description: There are drunk Ogres more sure-footed than this one.

backgroundSkills.name: Misshapen
backgroundSkills.description: Deformed by birth or made by the Ruinous Powers, yet there is honour within the prison of flesh.

backgroundSkills.name: Easily Deceived
backgroundSkills.description: "Tzeentch will have so much fun with you, puppet!"

backgroundSkills.name: Easily Distracted
backgroundSkills.description: "Look! Over there - a Snotling showing its arse!"

backgroundSkills.name: Easily Trapped
backgroundSkills.description: To trap a fool is easy; to trap a King… perhaps even easier.

backgroundSkills.name: Honourable
backgroundSkills.description: Honour is everything!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: In this age of blood and battle, intellect is an underrated gift.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Maimed Arm
backgroundSkills.description: "This one is armless, sir."

backgroundSkills.name: Maimed Leg
backgroundSkills.description: "No, not drunk, just legless."

backgroundSkills.name: Melancholic
backgroundSkills.description: "Why forlorn? Are you not a King, an Emperor - a champion?"

effects.description: Hero self-defence: -5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Phlegmatic
backgroundSkills.description: A calming presence can be a steadying hand… but also disquieting.

backgroundSkills.name: Sanguine
backgroundSkills.description: An assured air instils great confidence in your followers.

backgroundSkills.name: Disfiguring Scar
backgroundSkills.description: Such an ugly scar is always memorable.

backgroundSkills.name: Distinguishing Scar
backgroundSkills.description: Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.

backgroundSkills.name: Stupid
backgroundSkills.description: Shares the intellect of a River Troll.

backgroundSkills.name: Uncompromising
backgroundSkills.description: Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Diabolic Splendour
backgroundSkills.description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
